content.json:
## KMicro Tech, Inc. Sentinel Reporting

![KMicro Logo](https://kmicro.com/public/uploads/uploads-f89f6171df7eea91648253eb6d95a5b1.png)

Welcome to your cybersecurity reporting dashboard. Use the parameters below to adjust the time range, workspace, and cost settings.

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| summarize OpenedIncidents = countif(Status == "New"), ClosedIncidents = countif(Status == "Closed") by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| render timechart

Usage                                                                               // <--Query the Usage table
| where IsBillable == true                                                          // <--Only include 'billable' data
| summarize TotalVolumeGB = sum(Quantity) / 1000 by bin(StartTime, 1d), Solution    // <--Chop it up into GB / Day
| render columnchart                                                                // <--Graph the results
content.title: Billable Usage

content.query:
AuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| where OperationName in (
    "Add member to role requested (PIM activation)",
    "Add member to role completed (PIM activation)",
    "Add user",
    "Add member to group",
    "Add device",
    "Add registered owner to device",
    "Add member to role",
    "Add eligible member to role in PIM requested (timebound)",
    "Add eligible member to role in PIM completed (timebound)",
    "Add member to role in PIM completed (permanent)",
    "Add member to role in PIM requested (permanent)",
    "Add member to role outside of PIM (permanent)",
    "Add eligible member to role in PIM completed (permanent)",
    "Add eligible member to role in PIM requested (permanent)",
    "Add eligible member to role",
    "Add conditional access policy",
    "Add partner to company"
)
| summarize count() by OperationName
content.title: Top Operations Performed in Azure

content.query:
let PriorPeriod = toscalar(
    Usage
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(60d) and TimeGenerated <= ago(30d)
    | where IsBillable == true
    | summarize min(TimeGenerated)
);
let CurrentPeriod = toscalar(
    Usage
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
    | where IsBillable == true
    | summarize max(TimeGenerated)
);
let PriorData = Usage
    | where TimeGenerated between (PriorPeriod .. ago(30d))
    | where IsBillable == true
    | summarize PriorGB = round(todouble(sum(Quantity))/1024, 2) by DataType;
let CurrentData = Usage
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
    | where IsBillable == true
    | summarize CurrentGB = round(todouble(sum(Quantity))/1024, 2) by DataType;
PriorData
| join kind=fullouter CurrentData on DataType
| extend 
    DataType = coalesce(DataType, DataType1),
    PriorGB = coalesce(PriorGB, 0.0),
    CurrentGB = coalesce(CurrentGB, 0.0),
    ChangeGB = coalesce(CurrentGB - PriorGB, 0.0)
| project 
    ['Data Source'] = DataType,
    ['Previous 30 Days (GB)'] = PriorGB,
    ['Current 30 Days (GB)'] = CurrentGB,
    ['Change (GB)'] = round(CurrentGB - PriorGB, 2),
    ['Change %'] = iif(PriorGB > 0, round(((CurrentGB - PriorGB) / PriorGB) * 100, 1), 100.0),
    ['Change $'] = strcat('$', round(ChangeGB * {CostPerGB}, 2))
| where ['Current 30 Days (GB)'] > 0 or ['Previous 30 Days (GB)'] > 0
| top 10 by abs(['Change (GB)']) desc
content.title: Data Sources with Biggest Delta in Log Volume

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| summarize IncidentsCreated = count(), IncidentsClosed = countif(Status == "Closed") by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| render timechart
content.title: Incident Trend Over Time

content.query:
// Identifies alerts with significant increases compared to the previous period and categorizes severity levels.
let timeRange = 90d;
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeRange)
| summarize CurrentCount = count() by AlertName
| join kind=fullouter (
    SecurityAlert
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(2 * timeRange) and TimeGenerated <= ago(timeRange)
    | summarize PreviousCount = count() by AlertName
) on AlertName
| project AlertName, 
          CurrentCount = coalesce(CurrentCount, 0), 
          PreviousCount = coalesce(PreviousCount, 0),
          PercentChange = iff(PreviousCount == 0, 100.0, (CurrentCount - PreviousCount) * 100.0 / PreviousCount)
// Apply filters to focus on meaningful trends
| where CurrentCount > 10 
| where PercentChange > 50 
// Assign severity level indicators
| extend SeverityIndicator = case(
    PercentChange >= 500, "üî• Extreme Spike",
    PercentChange >= 200, "üî¥ Critical Increase",
    PercentChange >= 100, "üü† Major Increase",
    PercentChange >= 50, "üü° Moderate Increase",
    "üü¢ Low Increase"
)
// Apply color coding to % Change
| extend ChangeColor = case(
    PercentChange > 200, "üî¥",
    PercentChange > 100, "üü†",
    PercentChange > 50, "üü°",
    "üü¢"
)
// Sort by absolute % change in descending order to highlight most significant shifts
| sort by abs(PercentChange) desc
| top 10 by abs(PercentChange) desc
// Improve column naming for readability
| project ["Alert Type"] = AlertName, 
          ["Current Period Alerts"] = CurrentCount, 
          ["Previous Period Alerts"] = PreviousCount, 
          ["% Change"] = strcat(ChangeColor, " ", round(PercentChange, 2), "%"),
          ["Severity"] = SeverityIndicator
content.title: Alert Trends

content.query:
let TotalAlerts = SecurityAlert
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
    | summarize TotalCount = count()
    | extend Key = 1;
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| summarize Count = count() by ProductName
| extend Key = 1
| join kind=inner (TotalAlerts) on Key
| extend PercentageOfTotal = strcat(round(Count * 100.0 / TotalCount, 2),'%')
| top 10 by Count
| project ProductName, PercentageOfTotal
content.title: Incidents by Product

content.query:
// Shows percentage breakdown of incidents by severity
SecurityIncident 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d) 
| summarize Count = count() by Severity 
| extend Total = toscalar(
    SecurityIncident 
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(90d) 
    | count
)
| extend Percentage = Count * 100.0 / Total 
| project Severity, Count, ["Percentage (%)"] = strcat(round(Percentage, 2),'%')
| order by Severity asc
content.title: % Breakdown of Incidents by Severity

content.query:
// Top Log Sources with Cost (Enhanced with Colors & Emojis)
Usage
| where IsBillable == true
| summarize GB= round(sum(Quantity)/1000, 2) by DataType
| extend Cost=round(GB*{CostPerGB}, 2)
| sort by Cost desc
| extend CostLevel = case(
    Cost >= 1000, 'ü§ëü§ëü§ëü§ëü§ë',  // Most Expensive
    Cost >= 750,  'üí∞üí∞üí∞üí∞',
    Cost >= 500,  'üí∞üí∞üí∞',
    Cost >= 250,  'üí∞üí∞',
    Cost >= 100,  'üí∞',          // Least Expensive
    'üí∏'                         // Fallback
)
| extend Cost=strcat('$', Cost, ' ', CostLevel)
| project DataType, GB, Cost
| take 10
content.title: Top 10 Billable Log Sources

content.query:
// Top Security Events with Cost (Enhanced with Colors & Emojis)
SecurityEvent
| where _IsBillable == True
| summarize EventCount=count(), GB=round(sum(_BilledSize/1000/1000/1000),2) by EventID
| extend TotalCost = round(GB*{CostPerGB},2)
| sort by GB desc
| extend CostLevel = case(
    TotalCost >= 1000, 'ü§ëü§ëü§ëü§ëü§ë',  // Most Expensive
    TotalCost >= 750,  'üí∞üí∞üí∞üí∞',
    TotalCost >= 500,  'üí∞üí∞üí∞',
    TotalCost >= 250,  'üí∞üí∞',
    TotalCost >= 100,  'üí∞',          // Least Expensive
    'üí∏'                             // Fallback
)
| extend TotalCost=strcat('$', TotalCost, ' ', CostLevel)
| project EventID, GB, TotalCost
| limit 10
content.title: Top 10 Security Events

content.query:
// Top 10 Alerts with Percentage of Total Alerts - Updated/Advanced
let totalAlerts = toscalar(SecurityAlert
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
    | summarize TotalCount = count());
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| summarize Count = count() by AlertName
| top 10 by Count desc
| extend PercentageValue = round((Count * 100.0) / totalAlerts, 2)
| extend Percentage = strcat(PercentageValue, '%')
| extend Alert_Severity = case(
        PercentageValue > 20, 'üî• High Impact', 
        PercentageValue > 10, '‚ö†Ô∏è Moderate', 
        '‚úÖ Low Impact')
| project AlertName, Count, Percentage, ["Impact Level"] = Alert_Severity
content.title: Top 10 Alerts

content.query:
SigninLogs
| extend ResultText = case(isnotempty(ResultDescription), ResultDescription, ResultType == 0 and isempty(ResultDescription), "successful login", "unknown") // Create readable result text to include succesfull logins
| summarize dcount(CorrelationId) by ResultText // Signin results by unique CorrelationId
| render piechart
content.title: Login events by result

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where isnotempty(LocationDetails['countryOrRegion']) and ResultType == 0// Where location details are available and login is successful
| extend city = tostring(LocationDetails['city'])
| summarize count() by city, Location // Summarize by city name
| join (
SigninLogs
| extend city = tostring(LocationDetails['city'])
| make-series TrendList = count() on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by city 
) on city
| project Location, city, ["Total events"] = count_, TrendLine = TrendList
| top 10 by ["Total events"] desc
content.title: successful login locations

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn in ("high", "medium")
| extend Risk = case(
    RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "high", "üî¥ High Risk",
    RiskLevelDuringSignIn == "medium", "üü† Medium Risk",
    "‚ö™ Unknown"
)
| summarize RiskySignInAttempts = count(), UniqueUsers = dcount(UserPrincipalName) by UserDisplayName, Risk
| order by RiskySignInAttempts desc
| project UserDisplayName, Risk, RiskySignInAttempts
content.title: Risky (High and Medium) Sign-in Attempts by User

content.query:
//MTTR
SecurityIncident
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| where Status == "Closed"
| summarize MTTR = round(avg(datetime_diff('minute', ClosedTime, CreatedTime)),2)
| extend MTTR_Severity = case(MTTR <= 60, '‚úÖ Fast', MTTR <= 180, '‚ö†Ô∏è Medium', '‚ùå Slow')

// Get total MTTR
let TotalMTTRTable = 
    SecurityIncident
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
    | where Status == "Closed"
    | summarize TotalMTTR = round(avg(datetime_diff('minute', ClosedTime, CreatedTime)), 2)
    | extend Key = 1;  // Adding a key for joining
// Calculate MTTR per severity
let SeverityMTTR = 
    SecurityIncident
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
    | where Status == "Closed"
    | summarize MedianTTR = percentile(datetime_diff('minute', ClosedTime, CreatedTime), 50) by Severity
    | extend Key = 1;  // Adding a key for joining
// Join both results to calculate percentage
SeverityMTTR
| join kind=inner (TotalMTTRTable) on Key
| extend PercentageOfTotal = strcat(iff(TotalMTTR > 0, round((MedianTTR * 100.0) / TotalMTTR, 2), 0.0),'%')  // Ensure consistent data type
| extend MTTR_Severity = case(
        MedianTTR <= 60, '‚úÖ Fast', 
        MedianTTR <= 180, '‚ö†Ô∏è Medium', 
        '‚ùå Slow')
| project Severity, 
          ["Median Time to Resolve (minutes)"] = MedianTTR, 
          ["% of Total MTTR"] = PercentageOfTotal, 
          ["MTTR Classification"] = MTTR_Severity
| order by Severity asc
content.title: Median Resolution Time for each Severity Level

content.query:
//Top Users for Selected Event ID
SecurityEvent
| where _IsBillable == True
| where EventID == toint('{SelectedEventID}')
| summarize EventCount=count() by Account
| sort by EventCount desc
| limit 10
content.title: Top 10 Users for Selected Event ID

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where ResultType == 0 and AppDisplayName != ""
| summarize count() by AppDisplayName
| join (
SigninLogs
| make-series TrendList = count() on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, 4h) by AppDisplayName 
) on AppDisplayName
| top 10 by count_ desc
content.title: successful logins by application

content.query:
// Top Security Log Reasons with Cost (Enhanced with Colors & Emojis)
CommonSecurityLog
| where isnotempty(Reason) and Reason != "N/A"
| extend LogSizeBytes = strlen(tostring(pack_all()))  // Estimate log size per record
| summarize TotalEvents = count(), TotalGB = sum(LogSizeBytes) / (1024 * 1024 * 1024) by Reason, LogSeverity
| extend RawCost = round(TotalGB * {CostPerGB}, 2)
| sort by TotalEvents desc
| extend CostLevel = case(
    RawCost >= 1000, 'ü§ëü§ëü§ëü§ëü§ë',  // Most Expensive
    RawCost >= 750,  'üí∞üí∞üí∞üí∞',
    RawCost >= 500,  'üí∞üí∞üí∞',
    RawCost >= 250,  'üí∞üí∞',
    RawCost >= 100,  'üí∞',          // Least Expensive
    'üí∏'                             // Fallback
)
| extend IngestCost = strcat('$', tostring(RawCost), ' ', CostLevel)
| project Reason, LogSeverity, TotalEvents, TotalGB, IngestCost
| top 10 by TotalEvents desc
content.title: Top 10 CommonSecurityLogs by Severity

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| where Activity == '{SelectedActivity}'
| summarize count() by SourceUserName
| top 10 by count_ desc
content.title: Top 10 Users for Selected Activity

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where Reason == '{SelectedReason}'
| summarize count() by DestinationUserName, DestinationIP, SourceIP
| top 10 by count_ desc
content.title: Top 10 Users for Selected Reason

content.query:
EmailEvents
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| where ThreatTypes != ""
| summarize Count = count() by ThreatTypes, bin(Timestamp, 1d)
| order by Timestamp desc
| render timechart
content.title: Threat Trends

content.query:
// Identifies top recipients of phishing emails and categorizes severity based on volume
EmailEvents
| where ThreatTypes has "Phish"
| summarize PhishCount = count() by RecipientEmailAddress, SenderFromDomain
// Assign severity level indicators based on PhishCount
| extend SeverityIndicator = case(
    PhishCount >= 500, "üî• Extreme Volume",
    PhishCount >= 200, "üî¥ Critical Volume",
    PhishCount >= 100, "üü† Major Volume",
    PhishCount >= 50, "üü° Moderate Volume",
    "üü¢ Low Volume"
)
// Apply color coding to PhishCount
| extend CountColor = case(
    PhishCount >= 500, "üî•",
    PhishCount >= 200, "üî¥",
    PhishCount >= 100, "üü†",
    PhishCount >= 50, "üü°",
    "üü¢"
)
// Sort by the highest volume of phishing emails received
| top 10 by PhishCount desc
// Improve column naming for readability
| project ["Recipient Email"] = RecipientEmailAddress, 
          ["Sender Domain"] = SenderFromDomain, 
          ["Phishing Emails Received"] = strcat(CountColor, " ", PhishCount),
          ["Severity"] = SeverityIndicator
content.title: Top Blocked Phishing Events

content.query:
EmailEvents
| where ThreatTypes has "Malware"
| summarize MalwareEmailsQuarantined = count() by bin(Timestamp, 1d), RecipientEmailAddress, SenderFromDomain
| order by Timestamp desc
content.title: Top Blocked Malware Email Events

content.query:
// Identifies top recipients of phishing emails and categorizes severity based on volume
EmailEvents
| where ThreatTypes has "Phish"
| summarize PhishCount = count() by RecipientEmailAddress
// Assign severity level indicators based on PhishCount
| extend SeverityIndicator = case(
    PhishCount >= 500, "üî• Extreme Target",
    PhishCount >= 200, "üî¥ Critical Target",
    PhishCount >= 100, "üü† Major Target",
    PhishCount >= 50, "üü° Moderate Target",
    "üü¢ Low Target"
)
// Apply color coding to PhishCount
| extend CountColor = case(
    PhishCount >= 500, "üî•",
    PhishCount >= 200, "üî¥",
    PhishCount >= 100, "üü†",
    PhishCount >= 50, "üü°",
    "üü¢"
)
// Sort by the highest volume of phishing emails received
| top 10 by PhishCount desc
// Improve column naming for readability
| project ["Recipient Email"] = RecipientEmailAddress, 
          ["Phishing Emails Received"] = strcat(CountColor, " ", PhishCount),
          ["Severity"] = SeverityIndicator
content.title: Top Phishing Addressess

content.query:
// Identifies top phishing sender domains and categorizes severity based on volume
EmailEvents
| where ThreatTypes has "Phish"
| summarize PhishCount = count() by SenderFromDomain
// Assign severity level indicators based on PhishCount
| extend SeverityIndicator = case(
    PhishCount >= 1000, "üî• Extreme Threat Domain",
    PhishCount >= 500, "üî¥ Critical Threat Domain",
    PhishCount >= 200, "üü† Major Threat Domain",
    PhishCount >= 100, "üü° Moderate Threat Domain",
    "üü¢ Low Threat Domain"
)
// Apply color coding to PhishCount
| extend CountColor = case(
    PhishCount >= 1000, "üî•",
    PhishCount >= 500, "üî¥",
    PhishCount >= 200, "üü†",
    PhishCount >= 100, "üü°",
    "üü¢"
)
// Sort by the highest volume of phishing emails sent from a domain
| top 10 by PhishCount desc
// Improve column naming for readability
| project ["Sender Domain"] = SenderFromDomain, 
          ["Phishing Emails Sent"] = strcat(CountColor, " ", PhishCount),
          ["Severity"] = SeverityIndicator
content.title: Top Phishing Domains

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| summarize OpenedIncidents = countif(Status == "New"), ClosedIncidents = countif(Status == "Closed") by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| render timechart
content.title: Incidents Opened Vs. Closed

content.query:
let SystemAlertId = SecurityAlert  
//| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)  
| project SystemAlertId;  
SecurityIncident  
| where AlertIds has_any (SystemAlertId)  
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentNumber  
| extend assignedTo_ = tostring(Owner.assignedTo)  
| summarize  
    NewIncidents = countif(Status == "New"),  
    ClosedIncidents = countif(Status == "Closed"),  
    ActiveIncidents = countif(Status !in ("Closed", "Resolved"))  
by Severity  
| extend StatusIndicator = iff(ActiveIncidents == 0, "‚úÖ", "üîç")  
| order by NewIncidents desc

let SystemAlertId = SecurityAlert  
| project SystemAlertId;  
SecurityIncident  
| where AlertIds has_any (SystemAlertId)  
| where Status !in ("Closed", "Resolved")  // Exclude closed or resolved incidents
| summarize OldestIncident = min(TimeGenerated) by IncidentNumber, Severity  
| extend OldestTicketAge_Days = datetime_diff('day', now(), OldestIncident)  
| summarize 
    Under_1_Week = countif(OldestTicketAge_Days < 7),
    Under_30_Days = countif(OldestTicketAge_Days >= 7 and OldestTicketAge_Days < 30),
    Over_30_Days = countif(OldestTicketAge_Days >= 30)
  by Severity
| order by Severity asc

let SystemAlertId = SecurityAlert  
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)  
| project SystemAlertId;  
SecurityIncident  
| where AlertIds has_any (SystemAlertId)  
| where Status in ("New", "Active")  
| summarize OldestIncident = min(TimeGenerated) by IncidentNumber, Severity  
| order by OldestIncident asc  
| extend OldestTicketAge_Days = datetime_diff('day', now(), OldestIncident)  
| extend AgeCategory = case(
    OldestTicketAge_Days < 7, "üü¢ New (< 7d)", 
    OldestTicketAge_Days >= 7 and OldestTicketAge_Days <= 30, "üü° Aging (7-30d)", 
    OldestTicketAge_Days > 30, "üî¥ Stale (> 30d)", 
    "Unknown")  
| project IncidentNumber, Severity, OldestIncident, OldestTicketAge_Days, AgeCategory
//| sort by AgeCategory asc

let totalCount = toscalar(
    SecurityAlert
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
    | where isnotempty(Tactics)
    | mv-expand tactic = split(Tactics, ", ")
    | summarize Total = count()
);
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| where isnotempty(Tactics)
| mv-expand tactic = split(Tactics, ", ")
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(tactic)
| extend Percentage = strcat(round(Count * 100.0 / totalCount, 2),'%')
| extend TacticEmoji = case(
    tactic == "InitialAccess", "üö™",
    tactic == "Execution", "üí•",
    tactic == "Persistence", "üìå",
    tactic == "PrivilegeEscalation", "üöÄ",
    tactic == "DefenseEvasion", "üïµÔ∏è",
    tactic == "CredentialAccess", "üîë",
    tactic == "Discovery", "üîç",
    tactic == "LateralMovement", "üîÑ",
    tactic == "Collection", "üìÇ",
    tactic == "Exfiltration", "üì§",
    tactic == "Impact", "‚ö°",
    tactic == "CommandAndControl", "üì°",
    "‚ùì"  // Default emoji for unknown tactics
)
| project Tactic = strcat(TacticEmoji, " ", tactic), Count, Percentage
| sort by Count desc
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Most Common MITRE ATT&CK Tactics

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| where isnotempty(Tactics)
| mv-expand tactic = split(Tactics, ", ")
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(tactic)
| sort by Count desc
| top 10 by Count
| render piechart

let TotalCount = toscalar(
    SecurityAlert
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
    | where isnotempty(Techniques)
    | mv-expand technique = split(Techniques, ", ")
    | summarize TotalCount = count()
);
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| where isnotempty(Techniques)
| mv-expand technique = split(Techniques, ", ")
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(technique)
| extend Percentage = strcat(round(Count * 100.0 / TotalCount, 2),'%')
| sort by Count desc
| top 10 by Count
| project ["MITRE Technique"] = technique, Count, Percentage
content.title: Most Common MITRE ATT&CK Techniques

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| where isnotempty(Techniques)
| mv-expand technique = split(Techniques, ", ")
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(technique)
| sort by Count desc
| top 10 by Count
| project ["MITRE Technique"] = technique, Count
